name: TELEPHONE XXXVI
description:
This was made in less than 36 hours as part of a game of art telephone on Discord. I developed a little game using someone else's image as a starting point. It can be beaten in about seven minutes.

I made the character art, backgrounds, and title/game over screens. The game uses plugins by LadyBaskerville and Yanfly Engine Plugins. Everything else is a default RPG Maker MV asset.

Controls:
KEYBOARD
Arrow keys to move cursor
Enter or Z to select
Escape or X to cancel

MOUSE
Left click to select
Right click to cancel

MOBILE
Touch to select
Pinch the screen to cancel

The video on the sidebar here shows the game being played from start to finish. If you're stuck, try watching it.
